content:
A dedicated Backend Developer with over 3 years of experience specializing in WordPress Plugin Development. Highly proficient in PHP, React JS, and Gutenberg block development. Expertise in integrating complex e-commerce features and leveraging AI APIs (ChatGPT, TogetherAI) to automate content and image creation.
Technical Expertise Core Languages PHP, React JS, JavaScript, CSS, HTML
WordPress Development Plugin & Theme Development, Gutenberg Blocks, Custom Post Types (CPTs), Hooks and Filters
E-commerce & Payments PayPal, Stripe, Paddle PGW, WooCommerce Payments, PayU, Midtrans
APIs & AI Integration ChatGPT API, TogetherAI API, RESTful APIs
Advanced Features AI-Powered Content Automation, Partial Payments, Advanced Itinerary Builder, Form Editor
Tools & Version Control Git (GitHub, GitLab), Cursor IDE, Warp terminal, VS Code, Postman, Docker

title: Contact

content:
Backend Developer / WordPress Plugin Developer Codewing Solutions | May 2021 – Present
Spearheaded AI integration using the ChatGPT and TogetherAI APIs to automate recipe and image creation for plugins, significantly boosting content generation efficiency. Integrated critical payment gateways, now including Paddle PGW, along with PayPal, Stripe, and others, ensuring robust e-commerce functionality. Engineered complex and advanced features, including partial payments and an advanced itinerary builder. Developed and maintained WordPress plugins using a modern stack (PHP for the backend and React JS for dynamic interfaces). Led feature development for WP Delicious and contributed significantly to WP Travel Engine, coordinating releases.
summary:

  • Spearheaded AI integration using the ChatGPT and TogetherAI APIs to automate recipe and image creation for plugins, significantly boosting content generation efficiency.
  • Integrated critical payment gateways, now including Paddle PGW, along with PayPal, Stripe, and others, ensuring robust e-commerce functionality.
  • Engineered complex and advanced features, including partial payments and an advanced itinerary builder.
  • Developed and maintained WordPress plugins using a modern stack (PHP for the backend and React JS for dynamic interfaces).
  • Led feature development for WP Delicious and contributed significantly to WP Travel Engine, coordinating releases.
title: Experience

content:
AI-Powered Content Automation New Feature
Goal: Automated recipe and image creation within a plugin environment.
Technologies: ChatGPT API, TogetherAI API, PHP.
Achievement: Implemented logic to pass context-rich information to the API, enabling seamless, partial, and full recipe generation by the AI engine.
